timeline.bodyText: Quick question: I see these two configurations are added to the pom file of AlcorLib which means that it will applied to multiple microservices. Do you expect the need of customizing it differently?
timeline.author: xieus

replies.bodyText: No, it is no need to set different values at those two configurations. I am just not familiar with the usage of configuration file...
replies.author: Eric-Yuan

replies.bodyText: Done. Changed to use default values instead of modifying all configuration files
replies.author: Eric-Yuan

xieus

replies.bodyText: I know you are working on the UTs. I would recommend to add extensive UTs to cover ElasticIpAllocator. So important :)
replies.author: xieus

replies.bodyText: OK, I plan to take the mocks deeper to the database operations level, that should cover mostly function paths of ElasticIpAllocator. The existing one UT is just for test ;)
replies.author: Eric-Yuan

timeline.bodyText: ElasticIpAllocatedIpv4 support a set of ip address while Ipv6 has an individual ip. Do we expect to extend it to a set later?
timeline.author: xieus
